attributes.action: Support Bangladeshi students protest to have safe road and life in Bangladesh
attributes.background: Bangladeshi students are protesting only for a safe road and safe life . They are demanding safe road from Government. But Government are not supporting and killing the innocents kids whose age only 5- 16 years old . Help the students  to have a safe life  and transportation.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to raise this issue with the government of Bangladesh.
